import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Css/restaurentDetailsCss.css'; // Make sure to import your CSS file function RestaurentDetails() { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); }; return (
